metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3487 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
** REJECT ** Non Security Issue. See the binutils security policy for moredetails,https://sourceware.org/cgit/binutils-gdb/tree/binutils/SECURITY.txt

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3487` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.7
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.7
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.7

criterions.comment: binutils package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.7').
